item.title: vars can't use ifelapsed
item.description: Why doesn't body action if_elapsed work with vars type promises? Let's start with the details of body action if_elapsed. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 body action if_elapsed(x) # @brief Evaluate the promise every `x` minutes # @param x The time in minutes between promise evaluations { ifelapsed => "$(x)"; expireafter => "$(x)"; } The ifelapsed action body attribute is the number of minutes before next allowed assessment of a promise.
